description: Renowned architect Renzo Piano says his replacement for the Morandi bridge "is born of tragedy".
title: Genoa readies new bridge two years after tragic collapse
title_page: Genoa readies new bridge two years after tragic collapse - BBC News
maintext: "The worst thing was to tell my father that his son was dead," Giorgio tells me. "At first I couldn't do it and I lied to him and said 'they're fine' but inside I was crying. I feel like my heart is split in two and one part is missing. My father doesn't want to live any more."
